name: Aadu-puli-aatam
tagline: Aadu Puli aatam ((Tamil: ஆடுபுலி ஆட்டம், Game of goats and tigers )) is a strategic, two-player (or 2 teams) board game that is played in south India.
body:
Aadu-Puli-Aatam
===============

Aadu Puli aatam ((Tamil: ஆடுபுலி ஆட்டம், Game of goats and tigers )) is a strategic, two-player (or 2 teams) board game that is played in south India.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
